titleStmt.title: John Webb, alias, Hop-bodee-boody's last will and testament VVho departed this life at his nurses house in Turn-Mill-street, in the 85th. year of his age. VVith his pretty exploits, character, sayings, and epitaph.
titleStmt.author: Webb, John, 1674 or 5-1759. aut

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3: Hop-bodee-boody's last will and testament, &c.
Dated on p. 7: "this first day of April. 1674", suggesting that the biographical sketch, will, and collection of sayings is an elaborate joke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
